## Input.unsubscribe() method

Removes an existing input event subscription.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
unsubscribe(eventName: InputEventKind, buttonId: ActionButton, fn: (e: LocalActionButtonEvent) => void): false | Subscription[];
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  eventName | <code>InputEventKind</code> | The name of the event (see InputEventKind). |
|  buttonId | <code>ActionButton</code> | The id of the button. |
|  fn | <code>(e: LocalActionButtonEvent) =&gt; void</code> | The callback function used when subscribing to the event. |

<b>Returns:</b>

`false | Subscription[]`
